p.d: Kool Koor, the New York rapper graffiti artist and writer, has lived in Belgium for nearly thirty years. In Brussels, he invites Hadja to meet jazz bassist Reggie Washington, restaurant-owner Richard Schaffer, Renoar Hadri and the artist Aimé Mpane; before ending at the MDF Studio, dancing with MaIté and Saran. Presented by: Hadja Lahbib.
